QuestData.Title: Illidari Freedom
QuestData.Description: <Arduen Soulblade is bleeding from several ghastly wounds. It appears he was left here to die.>$B$BWithin the prison are three of our... <cough>... comrades.$B$BWe were taken by surprise while scouting the area.$B$BI am not long for this world, $n, but please... you can still save them.
QuestData.LogDescription: Free Sirius Ebonwing, Cassiel Nightthorn, and Asha Ravensong.
